{"step_by_step_thinking": "CSF leakage can be diagnosed by various methods. According to Document [1], β 2- transferrin level is a biomarker used to identify and confirm CSF leakage. Document [2] and Document [3] also mention that an increase in proteins can be an indicator of CSF leakage. Document [1] also mentions that glucose detection is not recommended as a confirmatory test for CSF leakage. However, there is no mention of 'Tram Line' in any of the documents as a method for diagnosing CSF leakage.", "answer_choice": "A"}
